page.syntax: Context.Security.ChangePasswordQuestionAndAnswer as L (UserName as C, Password as C, Question as C, Answer as C)

argument.name: L
argument.description: Return type, .T. if the user's question and answer was changed; otherwise .F.

argument.name: UserName as C
argument.description: The name of the user as is used during login.

page.description: Changes the security question and security answer for the user.
page.discussion: Context.Security.ChangePasswordQuestionAndAnswer() changes the security question and security answer for the user. Check Context.Security.CallResult.Success before using the return value.
